channel.title: .Net Magazine on Sander Schutten's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in .Net Magazine on Sander Schutten's Blog

item.title: Building Vista Media Center Add-ins (Dutch)
item.description: Itâ€™s been a while since I wrote an article on developing Vista Media Center Add-ins. A month ago the article was published in the Dutch .Net Magazine and today I found the digital version is available as well. In the article I demonstrate how to use the Viddler.com API to get a list of videos and display them in your add-in. The goal was to build a player for Viddler.com videos, but unfortunately the API method for getting the raw video is still not available.
